channel.title: The VNGRD Podcast
channel.description:
VNGRD is building a platform cooperative for podcasters. This podcast will cover updates on VNGRD's progress, interviews with podcast hosts, and interviews with people associated with the platform cooperative movement.
Support us at patreon.com/vngrd
channel.itunes:subtitle: VNGRD is building a platform cooperative for podc…
channel.itunes:author: The VNGRD Podcast

item.title: Episode 2 - Guest: Jeremy Muhia
item.itunes:author: The VNGRD Podcast
item.itunes:summary:
vngrd.online is live! (kind of) I monologue about supporting projects to restore power to the people. And Jeremy Muhia talks with me about his story, politics, software development, and speculation about the future.
Support this podcast at: https://www.patreon.com/vngrd

item.title: The Introduction
item.itunes:author: The VNGRD Podcast
item.itunes:summary:
We go over the need for platform cooperativism, VNGRD, and podcast logistics.
Platform Cooperativism: Challenging the Corporate Sharing Economy: http://www.rosalux-nyc.org/wp-content/files_mf/scholz_platformcoop_5.9.2016.pdf VNGRD: Cooperative Media for the Left: https://medium.com/@samp805/vngrd-cooperative-media-for-the-left-7499920455ea
Support us at patreon.com/vngrd Checkout our (temporary) website: vanguardians.gitlab.io
